On the main page, you can use the top Toolbar and Navigation Drawer to navigate all activities. It has a load button to load BBC news XML, click to turn to the news list page.

The news list page shows all the news. There has a progress loading bar on top. You can click news title to open web browser page, or click description to open news detail page. Also, you can click favourite to add this news to the favourite list page.
This page display news detail. It shows the news title, published date-time, and description. Click news title will open web browser page.

This page store your favourite news list. You can click news title to open web browser page, or click description to open news detail page. And, you can click empty favourite to remove this news from the favourite list.
